name: Neo.ire
description:
A tribute to the old noire detective films, in this prologue 2D platform game you begin to explore a corrupt city on a journey to discover who killed your last client and tried to cripple you.

My very first game and still a work in progress, feedback is welcome, comments or critiques! cheers

Key Features:

2D platformer

black and white game

jumping

Music by Josh Camp

Release date: 22/06/2016

Platform : PC

Price : $0

email: bigwalden@gmail.com

My name is Ben Walden; I have studied Fine art and 3D animation and I am currently studying Game Art at Media Design School in Auckland in hopes of working in industry creating art and games. Neo.ire is the first game I have made and it was done as part of my school work over 16 weeks.
